remarks: Version of ~ cbvex with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbvalv.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
bj-cbvalv.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-cbvalv.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbvexv $p |- ( E. x ph <-> E. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
